935850.name: Fantasy Grounds - Hellfrost: Death in the Mire (Savage Worlds)
935850.description:
Hellfrost: Death in the Mire

Death is only the beginning...
The village of Drayton is beset by plague. Seemingly abandoned by their healer, the villagers now turn to strangers for help. But there is more to the illness than appears, for the hand of the Norns is at work.
Three centuries ago their laid down a prophecy to the lord of Drayton, a prophecy that spelled disaster for his descendants. That time has come, and death now stalks the mire around Drayton.
The adventure is designed for Veteran characters.
Requires the Hellfrost Players Guide
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
